attributes.action: Gun Sports: A gun accident might kill you but economic failure will kill you and your family
attributes.additional_details:
Legalise gun ownership in the UK in the manner of the US Second Amendment. It is a great sport and will generate millions of pounds in revenue within the first year.Webley & Scott, the Colt Bisley named after and made for the English town of Bisley lets help restore and better promote our firearms firms and the UK can make great economic and social strides.
Criminals get their guns shipped in already and you can easy get a gun if you want one. So let’s legalise the trade so to make it safer and to be able to keep records on gun ownership for safer country. Look at gun ownership countries and the positive social and economic factors here. We are not all murderers, we can and are trusted.Lets have a safe and productive country. I ask only for you signature and in return you will have a solid economy and foundation to build on. Vote for freedom they have banned knifes they may comes for your soul or maybe they already have thats modern communism for you.
